lockCollateral(bytes32,(uint8,uint8,uint.details: The collateralizer has to set allowance beforehand. The custodian increases allowance for the AssetActor by amount of collateral

params.assetId: id of the asset with collateral requirements
params.terms: terms of the asset containing the collateral requirements

returns._0: true if the collateral was locked by the Custodian

returnCollateral(bytes32).details: resets allowance for the Asset Actor, reverts if state of the asset does not allow unlocking the collateral

params.assetId: id of the asset for which to return the collateral,

returns._0: true if the collateral was returned to the collateralizer

lockCollateral(bytes32,(uint8,uint8,uint.notice: Locks the required collateral amount encoded in the second contract reference in the terms.

returnCollateral(bytes32).notice: Returns the entire collateral back to the collateralizer if collateral was not executed before the asset reached maturity or it returns the remaining collateral (not executed amount) after collateral was executed and settled

userdoc.notice: Contract which holds the collateral of CEC (Credit Enhancement Collateral) assets.
